title: Clear night city driving, almost stopped, 30 braking events
caption: A car driving on a city street at night, almost stopped, with 30 braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The car is driving on a city street at night, almost stopped. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The street is well-lit with streetlights and there are traffic lights at the intersections. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The car is driving at a very slow speed because it is almost stopped. The driver is likely preparing to stop or make a turn. The presence of multiple parked cars on the side of the road suggests that this is a busy area with a lot of traffic. The driver needs to be cautious and pay attention to the traffic lights and other vehicles on the road to avoid any accidents.
